goal.tools.debugger

Class LoggingObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.debugger.LoggingObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DebugObserver

    public class LoggingObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements DebugObserver
    This is a default observer for Debugger that forwards breakpoint hit info to the InfoLog.
    Author:
    vincent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoggingObserver(ObservableDebugger debugger)
      By calling this, an observer is attached to given debugger.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getObserverName()
      Returns the name of the debug observer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggingObserver

        public LoggingObserver(ObservableDebugger debugger)
        By calling this, an observer is attached to given debugger. It forwards breakpoint hit info into the InfoLog log.
        Parameters:
        debugger - The current debugger.

    • Method Detail

      • getObserverName

        public java.lang.String getObserverName()
        Description copied from interface: DebugObserver
        Returns the name of the debug observer. Must contain unique name, otherwise subscribe will throw exception.
        Specified by:
        getObserverName in interface DebugObserver
        Returns:
        name of the debug observer.

      • notifyBreakpointHit

        public void notifyBreakpointHit(DebugEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: DebugObserver

        Handles debug events received from the debugger. A debugger calls this method whenever a debug event that needs to be reported occurs.

        IMPORTANT: this method is called by the thread that is being debugged. The method should return immediately to not block the calling thread. For pausing or stepping the (agent) thread that is being debugged, the corresponding debugger methods should be used.

        Specified by:
        notifyBreakpointHit in interface DebugObserver
        Parameters:
        event - debug event received from debugger.
